name: Opentip Store
tag_list: opentip, online-shopping, sporting-goods, office-products, office-supplies, electronics, apparel, home, garden, wholesale, retail, discount-shopping, clearance, coupons, affiliate, table-tennis, badminton, dhs, scoreboard
overview:
Opentip offers premium quality products at factory price. Opentip provides online shopping for promotional items, sporting goods, office products, home and garden products, musical instruments, electronics and computers, apparel, shoes and jewelry.

Opentip has proprietary sources of procurement worldwide and, most importantly, by using cutting edge supply chain technologies to achieve optimized inventory control. We buy at very large volume and mark up at a very thin margin, so as to achieve economy of scale. We constantly work with our suppliers to add new products to our base of products. The supply base keeps growing. As a result, most of our products have the lowest price wherever you shop around to compare. The toll free number is at your finger tip.

Most merchandise is backed by standard manufacturer warranty. We stand behind our sale. At Opentip, we ensure the integrity of every order by using GeoTrust, an Internet leader in security transactions. 8 years online business experience made us familiar with nearly all products field. Bulk purchase got special focus. If you are a reseller, institutional buyer, school, church, organization, or simply an individual who makes repeat purchase regularly with us, never hesitate request access to our wholesale pricelist.

Website: http://www.opentip.com/
